channel.title: Chapter04s on Datenverarbeitung in der Medienproduktion
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter04s on Datenverarbeitung in der Medienproduktion

item.title: Übung 4 - Meshgenerierung
item.description: Meshgenerierung BMesh Einführung # This example assumes we have a mesh object selected import bpy import bmesh # Get the active mesh me = bpy.context.object.data # Get a BMesh representation bm = bmesh.new() # create an empty BMesh bm.from_mesh(me) # fill it in from a Mesh # Modify the BMesh, can do anything here... for v in bm.verts: v.co.x += 1.0 # Finish up, write the bmesh back to the mesh bm.
